/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the street. The street itself is flanked by trees and shrubs on both sides, their green hues contrasting with the gray of the road. A car can be seen driving down the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise still landscape. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The colors in the image are muted, further enhancing the tranquil atmosphere.
